reviews.review_msg: One of the best professors I have ever had,  knowledgeable, funny guy, nice, and he grades fair. If you need clarification, he will talk with you after class or in office hours. Bad ratings seem to be coming from first year students who did poorly. Anyone with a shred of academic ability should find Dr. Boyanowsky's class a joy.
Ehor was a very engaging Professor and was very passionate about the material. If I could take another class with Ehor I would in a heartbeat!
